channel.title: Setup | Stash on Backup your Kubernetes Stateful Applications
channel.description: Recent content in Setup | Stash on Backup your Kubernetes Stateful Applications

item.title: Setup | Stash
item.description: Setup Install Community Edition Try Enterprise Edition Compare Editions The setup section contains instructions for installing the Stash and its various components in Kubernetes. This section has been divided into the following sub-sections: Install Stash: Installation instructions for Stash and its various components. Community Edition: Installation instructions for Stash Community Edition. Enterprise Edition: Installation instructions for Stash Enterprise Edition. Stash kubectl Plugin: Installation instructions for Stash kubectl plugin.

item.title: Upgrade | Stash
item.description: Upgrading Stash This guide will show you how to upgrade various Stash components. Here, we are going to show how to upgrade from an old Stash version to the new version, how to migrate between the enterprise edition and community edition, and how to update the license, etc. Upgrading Stash from v0.11.x and older to v0.12.x In Stash v0.11.x and prior versions, Stash used separate charts for Stash community edition, Stash enterprise edition, and Stash Addons catalogs.
